mdRecord.dcterms:title: Wright's stain kit
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: The Coleman and Bell Company
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Contained in a cardboard box, label information: Wright's Stain, QS 120 cc., Twelve Certified Tablets and Four 30 cc. Bottles of Methanol, U.S.P., Reagent Grade, Poison, The Coleman & Bell Co., Norwood, O., U.S.A., Stock No. 1-496-010; includes: 3 large empty bottles, label information: Methanol, Lot No. 520764; 2 small bottles, label information: Wright's Stain Certified, Lot No. CWr-26; directions included.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Medical laboratory technology
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
